artist: Artist: Doug Allen , et al.; Author: Lester Afflick , et al.; Publisher: Red Tape Publications, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, photomechanical illustration of a multitude of skeletal figures in a wasted landscape, with letterpress text, printed in offset lithography on coated paper covers; 190 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Redtape, no. 7: Tragicomix
